content.detailedDescription:
first off i was in the usaf and assigned to sac. i worked directly with b-52s with a security clearance. while i sat on the runways waiting for my bombers to come down i have seen hundreds of planes in flight and maneuvering. the only reason i tell you this is maybe it will boost your confidence in the validity of my observation.
 i was driving to dollywood with my sister, mother and daughter. my mother was in the passenger seat next to me, the others in the back. they were asleep at the time (of course they were, never a witness around when you need one) as i was driving,in the left center of my windshield i noticed an object in the sky at about a 45 degree angle from my seat. at first i assumed it was a plane so my eyes went back to the road, i looked back a few minutes later and it appeared to be in the same position. that is when i got interested, i started running through my mental check list and decided it was unknown to me. i thought hey a ufo, i hollered at my sister and told her to look up through the windshield and give me the camera. at this time it went from 0 to fast quick and in a hurry. first it moved 90 degrees up, 90 from that point to my right, down 90 below eye sight, then came 90 up from that point and moved to the right until out of sight. i did manage to snap only one picture because i was still driving at that time and the camera had to be winded up to get another shot.
 my sister still remembers me shouting to look, i suppose though since she was in the back she could not get a high enough view. i have always remembered the sighting and held on to the picture in my photo album. i saw it again just a few days ago and since i do have photoshop, i tinted and enlarged the object and low and behold its a regular ole round flying saucer. so i am now reporting the incident and providing the two pictures the one with the small object is untouched the other is the blown up image.
content.summary: Object remained in view for a number of mins manuvering

content.detailedDescription: It was all supposed to be simple really, we were heading to frys and such to meet someone and i wanted to bring along a few things even though i knew it wouldn't be too long there. my mom and elder cousin were lightly bantering in the car as i struggled to unlock the back seat door. and after a few grunts of disdain i had finally gotten it open, and hopped in immediately to escape the bitter cold, only to be told by my mom at the last minute to get the electric card and that's when my frustration kicked in and i swiftly hopped out the car so i could be in & out since all i was wearing for an ex use of a jacket was a thin cotten cardigan. stomping my way back to front door i turned to take a quick look up at the stars since i'm pretty fond of star gazing and i thought, 'a second look couldn't hurt'. how i was wrong. there in the sky amidst a few scattered stars was a unsettling and strangely lit "star". i had paused for a minute to observe it's movements because i knew i couldn't outright claim it to be something without full proof. it hadn't exhibited any strange signs so i went cautiously back into the house to go fetch the card. but when i rushed back out to observe it again, i saw the diamond shaped object,almost like a star from heaven brighten and dim at such a rate that was unknown to the casual stars i was used to seeing, and began to dissipate as soon as that. i was frantic and nervously yelled to my family members if they had seen what i saw, but no answer, only a curt yell to "hurry the hell up!". after that i rode with them silently, questioning my beliefs and all that we know as ares, and how quickly we are to feed our egos and proud ourselves thinking we're the most advanced thing to come. i thought of how wrong we are, and once again fell into a state of contemplating. i need to be honest right now, this isn't the first time i've seen a ufo in my neighborhood and i've also had strange occurrences in my house since i began to question and wonder about other life, going as far as speaking openly about it to others. i saw another ufo right when we got to frys and since then i've had this overwhelming sense of dread. please help me figure this out, i have a strange sense that something badight happen soon.
content.summary: I had mistook it for a uncharacteristically bright and unwavering star, and while i couldn't make out the details i knew something was off. it turns out i was right as it started to dim and dissipate to the point where it completely dissappeared.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Crazy stuff we are not alone folks take a look at this they were hovering little ones moving every were human face on one i was in st albert canda
content.summary: Fly ever were  green beams

content.detailedDescription:
It was in 1978/9. i was about 8/9 i was at school ( burdiehouse primary ) in edinburgh it was morning break at 9:45.
my friends and i were playing football ( soccer ) i was the goal keeper.  i just glanced at
my side and no further than 10ft from me was a hovering object the size of a football and i can only describe the colour of it as mixed and it looked like a planet. i was not frightened as i was young, i was that young i actually thought it was a planet. the object just hovered and i just watched it. next thing the bell went and i went back to class.  i did tell my teacher who went to window but the object was gone.
content.summary: Football sizes. and looked like a picture of a planet

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My partner was videoing me on a practice bull ride,at home like i do every week before a rodeo. it wasn't until playing back the video watching my ride a few times over a week, that i noticed these flying objects that i thought earlier were big birds, are definately an object that fits the description of a ufo, not a bird!
my partner and i have played the video back several times since, screen shoting them. now the attention has gone from my ride, to the ships in the sky!
my mother and other family members are also gob smacked with what they can see on the video, and are too, wanting answers! where do we go from here? before noticing them as ufo's, i didn't feel any different then any other day. just having a leg either side and my mind in the middle.
but now, i feel a presence of something definately out there,and am watching over my shoulder!
it was only by chance,of my video, that i discovered the flying objects/ufo's
they were so quick, like faster then the speed of light with some movements, like they disappear, then straight back. i thought there were four at first, but have now picked up maybe 6 or 7!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dark, soucer shaped with spike threw centre and sides. photos and video show this. only caught on video while videoing bull ride. they were very quicker then the eye! unbeleivable!

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i went outside for a cigarette and thought the stars seemed unusually bright and realized they were moving. all over the sky at different elevations. looked around on the ground and seen very fast apparitions moving around in different areas of where we are living.
content.summary: Seemed to be hundreds at different elevations zigzagging

content.detailedDescription: While i was driving home, we saw first an orange light appears to the north, then another light appear on its left side, simultaneously, then several lights, about 4 lights sequentially appear on the right side, apparently from another object just beside the other. this last light remained about 3 seconds.
content.summary: Strange lights appear in front of us while driving back to home

content.detailedDescription:
What is in these photos??  i live in the southwestern edge of las vegas near fort apache and blue diamond roads.  on january 14, 2017 around 4:05pm in the afternoon, i decided to take some photos of the setting sun which just had started breaking through the clouds near the snow-capped mountains in the distance.  i took three pictures with my android phone within a minute's time, and continued on a walk with my dog.  the next day i opened one of the photos to show a friend in the house i live.  when i zoomed in further and further, i noticed a strange grey-tinted circular to diamond shaped image in my photo getting bigger, blending in like a chameleon with the changing sky, mountains, and everything else.  the image is grey-ish and does have a pale curved cross indication on it when zoomed in closer.  i am not able to judge distance away from where i took photos but image has to be more than mile or two from where i was, short of the mountain range in the distance.  i showed it to this friend in the house and a couple other people.  we wondered what the image was.  none of us had ever seen anything like it.

we small-talked about it in the house but at that moment, i never thought to open the other photos until much later overnight when i was near sleep.  i thought to myself that i had taken the other two photos, and wondered if the image might be in those as well.  one of the other photos, after zooming in quite a bit, has the circular to diamond shaped orb image in the distance as well, but with a somewhat different appearance on it than the other photo.  when zoomed in, this 2nd photo has four symmetric darker circular indications on the lower edge of the image, with a pale mid-section, and a darker top couple of sections on the image.  the third photo i have does not have this grey orb image, i assume because i had panned over on the horizon not capturing the image when i took this photo.  i did include this third photo for viewing as well.

from what i can gather, the image on the two photos is not a dust spot on the lens because a dust spot would be at the same spot on each photo.  i do not have these strange orb images on any other personal photos i have, nor have i ever noticed in my lifetime images such as these on photos i have ever taken or seen.
content.summary: Photos i took of las vegas sunset and mountains show unidentified image.  i noticed image day later after zooming in.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been seeing this thing often, this is not the first experience. it looks like a star, but it is far too bright, thought it might be an aeroplane the first time, but it wasn't moving. thought it may be moving directly toward me but it never changed size, it stayed in the same place for an hour before descending out of sight, which took about five minutes. tonight, from where i'm sitting in my car, i saw it between the houses and watched it for thirty minutes, then it slowly moved out of sight, i'm not sure if was going down or moving wxnw, but after a few minutes and some tiptoes ahs neck stretching it was gone. i see this thing a few times a week, i'd like to know if anyone else has noticed it. i reported one a while back that was similar, saw it near the constellation orion, and recently saw a friend make a facebook post about a little 'star that isn't a star' spotted in the same place. possibly just a coincidence, but still seems worth mentioning. 
please email me for the photo, i can't attach it from my phone
content.summary: Brighter than any other star, lingered for a while then slowly moved out of sight

content.detailedDescription: These are photos taken from separate trail cams i have set up at different locations on my property.  my wife did spot three glowing lights in the northern sky the night before i retrieved these from my cams.  there may or may not be any correlation between her seeing lights and the pics my trail cams captured.
content.summary: Trail cam pics

content.detailedDescription:
1. while sitting in our screen room around 18:40 i caught movement of of the corner of my eye and noticed orbs of light moving from wnw to west moving in a horizontal line just above the tree tops.

2. at first i thought they may be planes as we are near the daytona beach airport flight path but they were not blinking or moving in the direction of the airport. they were also brighter and larger than venus which i could see at the time in another part of the sky.
 
3. once they moved into a clear patch of sky the first 5 were in a rectangle shape with an orb in each corner and one near the center. they maintained these positions until they suddenly disappeared when due north. the rest of the orbs were less organized but all disappeared when they reached the same spot. 

4. i have seen chinese lanterns in the sky before and these were not moving in the same way. there was very little wind movement at ground level and it was blowing in the opposite direction to the movement of the orbs.

5. at first i wasn't sure what to think but felt excited that the sighting appeared to be of an "unknown" origin. i have been interested in the phenomenon for years. 

6. they disappeared when they reached a specific spot in the sky, group by group.
content.summary: Witnessed 12 - 15 bright orbs moving in a straight line from wnw to n at which time they disappeared when they reached a certain point in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
1)getting out of my car.
2)caught my attention because of how bright it was.
3)wasn't sure until got the camera to zoom in.
4)hovering circular shape.
5)a bit nervous.
6)still there at the moment.
content.summary: Looked like an extremely bright star but when zoomed in was something else.

content.detailedDescription:
I was video taping my friend reading the first page of a book,
after less than a minute i saw the ufo from the window
as it was in front of me and the camera was on a desk to my right filming him.
and i took the camera to focus on that ufo.
it is in the area of the flight departure path of the "ben gurion" tlv magor airport in israel and it was not an airplane
it moved from east to west in about 2 minutes.
it change its shape few times.
it looks like someone riding a snake,than changed to circle ufo,
and than to someone riding a horse and to a human figure.
 we were amazed and trying to focus on it.
as it went over the window sight didn't continue to check it 
from other window.
content.summary: The ufo was flying from east to west and changed many shapes.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work on night shift, i was showing a coworker a ufo video on youtube. i jokingly said "i'm going alien hunting" as i was walking out of the front door. i noticed there were two bright white stars out instead of one which i had noticed before. as i was watching it i noticed one was moving horizontally at a steady pace, it suddenly stopped, turned a dark reddish color then shot straight up into the night sky, it's speed made it seem to disappear. i called my cooworker to see it but he was too late, it was also too fast for me to record it on my phone.
content.summary: Looked exactly like star, moved straight across the sky turned red then shot up and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: it was 01/25/17 at 7:33 a.M. eastern time. my son travis was leaving our house to go to his bus stop in the morning. when he got to the sidewalk between our house and our neighbor's house he saw a spherical reflective object dancing among the clouds. the sun was shining. the conditions were bright and clear. he took out his cell phone and filmed this object for thirty six seconds before it disappeared behind a cloud.
content.summary: I was going to my bus stop in the morning and i filmed an object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving back from corpus christi from texas am corpus to san antonio on high way 37 north.
2.  it was really bright in the sky and i thought it was an aircraft at first. but there was no red approach light or anything to say it was an aircraft.
3.  i thought it was an aircraft of some sort.
4.  it approached at a stead pace and the lights got brighter and brighter to the point where i pulled on the side of the highway fearing my life. at the last second the four lights veered to the left and suddenly disappeared. it appeared to be some type of rectangle craft.
5.  during the event i was terrified as i thought it was going to land on the highway. i was on the phone with a friend and told her i had to hop off because there was an aircraft about to crash into me. all i could think of was how i was going to survive the crash.
6. i lost sight because i kept going north on the 37 freeway heading home.

extra:  the biggest and spookiest thing that happened that was witnessed by several callers the next night (tuesday), was that my ringer changed to the xfile theme song all night. i do not subscribe to that service. also when it happened i looked at the service in my phone and it showed it was in maintenance. none of my kids phones showed the same. the next day it was off of the phone and i called sprint and they had no record of a change and also, i never subscribed to that offering.  the tech support says there is no way the ring tone could have changed.  i have several witnesses who called my phone to hear this. i would love to know if anyone else has had this problem??????? spooky as helll!!!!
content.summary: I was driving back to san antonio and encountered 4 lights that caused me to get off road. then next night ring tone turned to xfiles song without me changing it.

content.detailedDescription: Observed stationary object that appeared to be pulsating. took photos with cell phone, enhanced, and discerned object was shifting shape.
content.summary: Light changed shapes in short time

content.detailedDescription: This is a secret report of police center...
content.summary: Over the police station

content.detailedDescription: I got out of my truck after coming back to my residence and was looking at how blue the sky was when my attention was drawn to what i assumed was a balloon that had an odd appearance. it seemed to hover but it also seemed to be changing shape. first i grabbed some binoculars to look at it and i couldn't figure out what it was so i snapped three photos of it and a very short video. then i went inside and i haven't noticed it since.
content.summary: Like a piece of silly string hanging in the sky( not what my pictures show )

content.detailedDescription: We were on our way to chicago to see a concert. we didn't actually see the object. my girlfriend was taking pictures of the windmills at the time and didn't notice the object until a couple of months later when she was looking through the pictures and noticed a light in one of them. there were no airplanes, helicopters, weather balloons or any other objects in the air at the time of the pictures.
content.summary: Didn't know it was in picture.

content.detailedDescription: many more sightings have been picked up via my camera since, my camera began activating, on communications receive-if at the beginning of these events approx 2005.
content.summary: Photos of ufos & entities

content.detailedDescription:
my first encounter was late night or early morning.  as my wife and i slept, i was awakened by a very bright light and whirring sound.  the light came through the bedroom window next to me.  i heard this low pitch whirring sound, unlike anything i was familiar with.  there was no other noise which seemed strange, because i had dogs in the yard.  as i tried to get up and look out the window, i realized i was paralyzed.  the sound and light lasted approximately 15 minutes.  i went back to sleep and explained to my wife what had happened the next day.

  the second encounter was also late night or early morning and again my wife and i were in bed.  i awoke levitated approximately two feet above my mattress.  on my wife's side of the bed i observed two small figures.  there was also a third figure at the foot of the bed.  all three were wearing hooded cloaks and appeared to be approximately four to five feet tall.  as i levitated above my bed, i could feel my body being examined.  there was no pain and the figures remained motionless.  after approximately thirty minutes, my body abruptly dropped to the bed.  i was awake and had regained my ability to move.  breathing heavily and wet with sweat, i awoke my wife.  i explained what i had just encountered and she seemed unconcerned.

encounter three was a little less eventful.  at the time of my encounters, i was employed as a sheriffs deputy.  this event occurred while i was on duty and in my patrol vehicle.  it was winter and i was on a well lit, well traveled road, approaching a railroad crossing.  the crossing had no lights or mechanical arms.  as i approached the crossing, i noticed a bright light to my right.  the light was a great distance away and was not moving.  it was a clear night with no moon or stars.  the time was approximately 7pm.  i kept my eye on the light, looking for movement or something to help me identify it.  it never moved and it was definitely not a earthbound light.  getting to the railroad crossing, my vehicle stopped and i was still trying to figure out the light source.  the next thing i remember was being at the railroad crossing and looking at the clock on my dash.  it was approximately 9pm.  had i been sitting on a well traveled road, at a railroad crossing for two hours?  the light was gone and i continued my work.  i have no memory of what happened those two hours and can only speculate on a possible abduction.

  i have had no other encounters and have shared these with many people.  the encounters were interesting, but not alarming.  do i believe in aliens?  i can only tell you my experiences and let you decide.  something happened and i have relayed the information.  maybe i'll have another encounter, that will prove they exist.
content.summary: Three separate alien encounters

content.detailedDescription: I was with friends driving home late at night when one of us noticed the disc-like object flying rather quickly in a downward diagonal direction. it was sort of far away and though we followed it a bit with a car, we couldn't be sure what it was but we felt like it had to be a ufo. when arriving home, my two friends sitting in the back seat both felt a presence behind them but saw no one when they instinctively turned towards it. we decide to rush inside when all of a sudden we see the saucer again, much much closer this time. it was clearly a disc-like shape with flashing blue and white lights and a quiet machine sound barely louder than the strong wind we were also hearing. we all dropped the bags we were carrying to run towards the street to get a better view, but it was already descending diagonally downwards fast and it quickly fell below the tree level in less than 15 seconds. because it was so fast, barely anyone could pull out something to record with but somehow one of us already had our phones out and took a very unclear video. we have heard the noise again but haven't looked because we are scared.
content.summary: There was a saucer in the sky right above my house.

content.detailedDescription: Got out of a car and heard this extemely weird noise. the sound was nothing like i've heard before. my friend then screamed and said she saw something weird in the sky. i looked and there was a saucer and it had weird different flashing lights and produced a blue aura around it. i was 3 other people and no one could deny what they saw. it moved so quickly and didn't look like a plane at all.
content.summary: No one could deny what they saw!

content.detailedDescription: I first saw the saucer from very far away. a friend and i felt certain that's what it was. it was moving so strangely and quickly and also was casting a bright beam which is what got my attention in the first place. once we got to my house and got out of the car all four of us saw it again right above us it seemed like. it was huge i can't express how big it was... it made a very quiet whirling type sound and it moved away quickly like so fast that when i ran inside my house to go out on the porch to see it and it was was past the tree line already.. i don't know how it moved so fast but none of us could deny what it was. it was clear as day.
content.summary: The sound was very creepy but very quiet. almost like a breeze or a whoosh. so many lights and it was huge.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a church meeting when i noticed what i thought was a brilliantly bright star, or possibly a full moon. (there's not a full moon today.) i continued driving, watching it when i noticed it had gone from the left, over to my right. strange to me. it didn't dart about, but it was too quick to be an airplane, jet, or helicopter. also, the brightness of it was not that of any aircraft. no blinking lights. just star-like. watched it go back behind cloud cover, then had visible view once i pulled into our road. there's a clearing where there are power poles set, & i really got a good view of it then. i pulled my truck over, & turned my phone video on. i observed it hovering for about almost 3 minutes. it then disappeared behind cloud cover once again, & that was the last i saw of it. 


🛑 i have a 2 min. 21 second video of the craft hovering, but am having extreme difficulty getting it to load. if someone could contact me a different way, i can send it differenely.
content.summary: Noticed big star like craft heading home. it moved directions from sw to w. then hovered.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a co-worker saw a blue pulsating orb darting back and forth and up and down. it changed colors in no particular pattern. i shined a spotlight in the object to see if some was flying a drone in the area, at which time it darted off and disappeared.  i tried to video it but couldn't pick it up on my phone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On the night of jan, 24 around 2 am myself and a co-worker observed a very bright blue orb of light. it was hovering and darting speratically only stopping when i shined a spot light on it . it also was pulsing from bright blue to green to red and white.

content.detailedDescription:
I was upstairs in our home laying in bed. it was near midnight, and it was a clear, warm summer night.  i woke up for some reason and sat up and looked out my bedroom window (which faces the north west direction). we live in the country and it is very quiet and dark at night (no street lights). route 605 is a rural road and our house is quite close to it.  
across the road is our neighbor (another old farm house).  when i looked out the window, i saw something hovering in the sky close to the horizon (but above the trees, behind my neighbors house.  we live on a hill (ridge) and the crest of the ridge is behind my neighbors house. what i saw looked a bit like a string with lights on it in the sky. it was moving a bit like a snake would (wave pattern), but it had lights on it in different colours.  it made no sound and i watched it for about a minute.  i got up out of bed and went downstairs.  my brother was still up (playing x-box), and i grabbed the camera. i told my brother to come look, that there was something floating in the air above my neighbors house.  we ran outside to our front lawn, and i tried to take as many photos of it as i could. i took about 4 photos (most were too dark for any detail, which we found out later), but while we watched it (it was slowly moving from right to left) it seemed to shift direction (90 degrees) and start to move away from us.  it wasn't like a plane turning. it simply stopped in the air, seemed to spin around and then start to move. in a matter of a few seconds, it disappeared.  it seemed to be speeding up as it moved away. we only saw this thing the one time, and have held off in reporting it. 

the best photo i have attached.  i am standing on our side of the road, looking up through the power/telephone lines, with the neighbor's trees (on their front lawn) in the photo.  the largest tree is a large poplar tree, approximately 15 - 20 m tall.
content.summary: Long, "flexible" object, multicolored, hovered then moved away towards nw

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Everyday clever traslucent 737 size warning telepathically presence can be felt if i m at home. as ny other aircraft comes in proximity fades away sometimes. moves up once in a big spiral motion only the streak illusion is left behind. not sure that was it the flight path taken.
content.summary: Everyday clever traslucent bid 737 size warning telepathicallly presennce can be felt if i m at home

content.detailedDescription: Me & my husband were pulling into a restaurant & it was located behind what we dubbed wally world store but above in the sky. we noticed it immediately as not a star but brighter than one. it was shiny metallic & reflected light. it looked spherical,possibly rotating by the way the blinking was. we immediately knew it was a ufo, no questions about it. i even posted it in real time to my internet page. we got out of our van & i was pulling out my iphone when it just blinked out. i wanted to use the names of places but this did not allow names. we both were mesmerized & went looking for it again after we go our food. we did notice that near this area there were strange looking clouds near this area. like a big fluffy donut like shape.
content.summary: Pulled into taco bell & saw a bright metallic object that was not moving right behind walmart but way up. it looked metallic & when we got out of the car w/ my phone on it was gone
